org.sql: SELECT users.* FROM users INNER JOIN users_roles ON users_roles.user_id = users.id INNER JOIN roles ON roles.id = users_roles.role_id WHERE users_roles.role_id = "$1" AND (users.username ILIKE '%greg%' OR users.name ILIKE '%greg%')

rewrites.sql: SELECT users.* FROM users INNER JOIN users_roles ON users_roles.user_id = users.id WHERE users_roles.role_id = "$1" AND (users.username ILIKE '%greg%' OR users.name ILIKE '%greg%')
SELECT users.* FROM users INNER JOIN users_roles ON users_roles.user_id = users.id WHERE users_roles.role_id = "$1" AND (users.username ILIKE '%greg%' OR users.name ILIKE '%greg%') LIMIT 1

SELECT users.* FROM users INNER JOIN users_roles ON users_roles.user_id = users.id INNER JOIN roles ON roles.id = users_roles.role_id WHERE users_roles.role_id = "$1" AND (users.username ILIKE '%greg%' OR users.name ILIKE '%greg%') LIMIT 1
